extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization part of the HPH Sector?

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Public Key Infrastructure
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy public key infrastructure and digital certificates to authenticate connections with the network, IoT medical devices, and the electronic health record system.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Standard User Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Use standard user accounts on internal systems instead of administrative accounts to ensure least privilege.

extracted_playbook.title: Turn Off Network Device Management Interfaces
extracted_playbook.description: Turn off network device management interfaces such as Telnet, SSH, Winbox, and HTTP for WANs and secure with strong passwords and encryption when enabled.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure PII/PHI
extracted_playbook.description: Secure personal identifiable information (PII)/patient health information (PHI) at collection points and encrypt the data at rest and in transit using technologies such as TLS.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Stored Data
extracted_playbook.description: Protect stored data by masking the permanent account number (PAN) when displayed and rendering it unreadable when stored through cryptography.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement HIPAA Security Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Secure the collection, storage, and processing practices for PII and PHI per HIPAA regulations to prevent malware introduction.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Monitoring Tools for IoT Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Use monitoring tools to observe whether IoT devices are behaving erratically due to a compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Create and Review Internal Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Create and regularly review internal policies that regulate the collection, storage, access, and monitoring of PII/PHI.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization preparing for ransomware?

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Offline Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain offline backups of data, regularly test backup and restoration, and ensure all backup data is encrypted and immutable.

extracted_playbook.title: Create Cyber Incident Response Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Create, maintain, and exercise a basic cyber incident response plan and associated communications plan that includes response procedures for a ransomware incident.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Notification Procedures Adhere to Laws
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure notification procedures adhere to applicable state laws and refer to the National Conference of State Legislatures for information on data breach laws.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Updates and Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Install updates for operating systems, software, and firmware as soon as they are released to minimize exposure to cybersecurity threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP)
extracted_playbook.description: Secure and monitor RDP by restricting access, requiring MFA, and using VPNs for external connections.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict SMB Protocol
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict Server Message Block (SMB) Protocol within the network to only access necessary servers and disable outdated versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Third-Party Vendor Security
extracted_playbook.description: Review the security posture of third-party vendors and monitor connections for suspicious activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Application Whitelisting
extracted_playbook.description: Implement listing policies for applications and remote access that only allow execution of known and permitted programs.

extracted_playbook.title: Conduct User Training and Phishing Exercises
extracted_playbook.description: Implement user training programs and phishing exercises to raise awareness about the risks of suspicious websites, links, and attachments.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Require MFA for services, especially for webmail, VPNs, and accounts accessing critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Use strong passwords and avoid reusing passwords for multiple accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Antivirus and Antimalware Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install and regularly update antivirus and antimalware software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Only use secure networks and consider installing and using a VPN.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Hyperlinks in Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Disable hyperlinks in received emails to prevent phishing attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Respond to Ransomware Incidents
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the organization's Ransomware Response Checklist, scan backups for malware, and report incidents to the FBI, CISA, or USSS.
